计软智网转专业试题回忆版、模拟题及参考解答
  • 网安 2022 年模拟题
  • 1. 阅读程序题
  • 1. 对象的生命周期/存储周期（带输出的构造与析构）
  • 3. 动态生命周期（dynamic lifetime）
  • 查看页面源码

3. 动态生命周期（dynamic lifetime）

说明

运行到 new 时开始, delete 时结束.

 1auto main() -> int {
 2  Printer* c1 = new Printer{Info{.ctor = "0", .dtor = "1"}};
 3  Printer* c2 = new Printer{Info{.ctor = "2", .dtor = "3"}};
 4  delete c1;
 5  delete c2;
 6}
 7// 最终输出
 8// 0: c1 构造
 9// 2: c2 构造
10// 1: c1 析构
11// 3: c2 析构

如果不 delete 则不发生析构而内存泄露.

1auto main() -> int {
2  Printer* c1 = new Printer{Info{.ctor = "0", .dtor = "1"}};
3}  // 指针本身为自动生命周期而析构, 它指向的对象为动态生命周期而泄露
4// 最终输出
5// 0: c1 构造

题目

题 1

1auto main() -> int {
2  Printer* c1 = new Printer{Info{.ctor = "s", .dtor = "o"}};
3  Printer* c2 = nullptr;
4  c2          = new Printer{Info{.ctor = "t", .dtor = "l"}};
5  delete c1;
6  Printer* c3 = new Printer{Info{.ctor = "i", .dtor = "u"}};
7  c2          = c3;
8}

点击查看提示

4 个字符, 将 std::string 转换为对应 int 类型的方法.

点击查看答案

[在线代码 d3o6rf6hx], 答案: stoi.

题 2

 1auto main() -> int {
 2  {
 3    Printer* c1 = nullptr;
 4    c1          = new Printer{Info{.ctor = "i", .dtor = "h"}};
 5    Printer* c2 = new DerivedPrinter{Info{.ctor = "n", .dtor = "_"},
 6                                    DerivedInfo{.ctor = "n", .dtor = "r"}};
 7    Printer* c3 = nullptr;
 8    {
 9      c3 = new Printer{Info{.ctor = "e", .dtor = "m"}};
10      c3 = c2;
11      delete c2;
12    }
13    Printer* c4 = nullptr;
14  }
15  Printer* c5 = nullptr;
16  Printer* c6 = nullptr;
17  Printer* c7 = new Printer{Info{.ctor = "p", .dtor = "w"}};
18  {
19    c5          = new Printer{Info{.ctor = "r", .dtor = "p"}};
20    Printer* c8 = new Printer{Info{.ctor = "o", .dtor = "l"}};
21  }
22  {
23    Printer* c9 = new Printer{Info{.ctor = "d", .dtor = "s"}};
24    c6          = new Printer{Info{.ctor = "u", .dtor = "c"}};
25  }
26  delete c6;
27  Printer* c10 = new Printer{Info{.ctor = "t", .dtor = "v"}};
28}

点击查看提示

13 个字符, STL 求两个范围的内积.

点击查看答案

[在线代码 f4q4d117o], 答案: inner_product.

题 3

 1auto main() -> int {
 2  {
 3    Printer c1{
 4        Info{.ctor = "s", .copy_ctor = "u", .copy_assign = "s", .dtor = "l"}};
 5    Printer* c2 = new Printer{
 6        Info{.ctor = "s", .copy_ctor = "o", .copy_assign = "t", .dtor = "r"}};
 7    Printer* c3 = nullptr;
 8    c1          = *c2;
 9  }
10  Printer* c4 = new Printer{Info{.ctor = "e", .dtor = "y"}};
11  Printer c5{Info{.ctor = "a", .dtor = "m"}};
12  Printer* c6 = nullptr;
13}

点击查看提示

7 个字符, 编程题解答参考中所用到的一个头文件.

点击查看答案

[在线代码 aWz5WYjTo], 答案: sstream.
